mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrPsnlInfoUsefMbd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN , PSNL_INFO_USEF_MBD_TURN , PSNL_INFO_USEF_MBD_CD , ADMIN_ID , MBR_NO , PSNL_INFO_USEF_COM_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_PSNL_INFO_USEF_MBD WHERE 1 = 1 AND PSNL_INFO_USEF_SN = #{psnlInfoUsefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND PSNL_INFO_USEF_MBD_TURN = #{psnlInfoUsefMbdTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
